mapper.select: select t.title, t.summary, t.clicks, t.id, t.likes, t.gmt_create, t.mid, t.comments, b.realname, b.avatar, a.id as cms_user_like from cms_content t left join writer_user b on t.author_id=b.id left join cms_user_like a on a.content_id=t.id where t.category_id='1' order by clicks desc limit #{startrow},#{endrow}
mapper.update: update cms_content set likes=#{likes} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from cms_user_like where writer_id=#{writer_id} and content_id=#{content_id}
